statement: CLI should provide three control modes: single-shot status, watch/polling, and blocking wait, plus explicit start/pause/resume/cancel commands for experiments and evidence workflows.
rationale: Common tools (gh, kubectl, AWS, docker) expose these modes to cover human and automation needs.
keyAssumptions: CLI will have access to run IDs and state endpoints
validationCriteria: Users can manage workflows without direct DB access
critiquePoints: Websocket streaming may be enough; blocking wait may be redundant
questions: Which mode is highest priority for current users?
